name: travel to GolemPark
description:
Point & Click is an adventure game that tells the story of a boy named Mik who receives winning tickets to a robot festival. And that would not go alone gathers friends for a trip. The action takes place in the near future in a parallel universe where robotic technologies are developed.
Control with the mouse and keyboard.
A double click on items in the inventory has been added to the game, which changes their state.
All grafic in the game is hand-drawn.
The game is being developed by an independent studio consisting of 2 people.
